text: The Hangover Part II is a 2011 American black comedy movie and the second installment of the trilogy. It was directed by Todd Phillips and is set in Bangkok, Thailand. The movie received negative reviews with a 35% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 44 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == * Bradley Cooper as Philip "Phil" Wenneck * Ed Helms as Dr. Stuart "Stu" Price * Zach Galifianakis as Alan Garner * Ken Jeong as Leslie Chow * Jeffrey Tambor as Sidney "Sid" Garner * Justin Bartha as Douglas "Doug" Billings * Paul Giamatti as Kingsley * Jamie Chung as Lauren Srisai, Stu's fianc√©e * Sasha Barrese as Tracy Billings * Mason Lee as Teddy, Lauren's brother * Gillian Vigman as Stephanie Wenneck * Bryan Callen as Samir ==References== == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2011 buddy movies Category:2011 comedy movies Category:2010s black comedy movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:2010s buddy comedy movies Category:Bangkok Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Thailand Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Todd Phillips Category:Screenplays by Todd Phillips Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies about primates Category:American buddy comedy movies
title: The Hangover Part II
